Title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
Writer: Dr. Seuss (book), Irv Spector (additional story), Bob Ogle (additional story)
Plot: Bitter and hateful, the Grinch is irritated at the thought of the nearby village having a happy time celebrating Christmas. So disguised as Santa Claus, with his dog made to look like a reindeer, he raids the village to steal all the Christmas things. The village is sure to have a sad Christmas this year.
